mapper.insert: insert into feedback (id, project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, images) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update feedback set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, images from feedback where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, project_id, title, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, images from feedback
